critique:
This document is an executive order that amends a previous executive order (13597) related to visa and foreign visitor processing. It removes a subsection from the previous order and instructs the Secretaries of State and Homeland Security to revise the implementation plan accordingly. The order also includes general provisions that clarify its scope and limitations.
